name: Anycubic Kobra 3 V2 firmware (Mirror)
description: Mirror for Anycubic Kobra 3 stock firmwares

firmwares.changes:
1.Purge volume config. in ACS Next
2.Zone Leveling
3.More stable file transfers
*ACSNext >= 1.3.5

1.New: Adjustable AI detection sensitivity
2.New: Type-based filament mapping
3.New: support for cold bed tem
4.Fixed: Large file parsing failures

1.Video service upgrade
2.Print stop during prep phase
3.M201/M203/M205 commands

1.[New] Support for .gcode.3mf, and M73
2.[New] Sending print files from OrcaSlicer
3.[New] Remote time-lapse file management
4.[New] Manual axis movement during paused
5.[New] Motion control algorithm upgrade
